description: Microsoft says Windows 10 updates released since the start of the year are breaking Microsoft Connected Cache (MCC) node discovery on enterprise networks. [...]
title: Recent Windows updates break Microsoft Connected Cache delivery

description: Ransomware attacks targeting VMware ESXi and other virtual machine platforms are wreaking havoc among the enterprise, causing widespread disruption and loss of services. [...]
title: The Week in Ransomware - April 5th 2024 - Virtual Machines under Attack

description: Approximately 16,500 Ivanti Connect Secure and Poly Secure gateways exposed on the internet are likely vulnerable to a remote code execution (RCE) flaw the vendor addressed earlier this week. [...]
title: New Ivanti RCE flaw may impact 16,000 exposed VPN gateways

description: Microsoft has fixed a known issue causing 0x80073cf2 errors when using the System Preparation (Sysprep) tool after installing November Windows 10 updates. [...]
title: Microsoft fixes Windows Sysprep issue behind 0x80073cf2 errors

description: Hackers are using Facebook advertisements and hijacked pages to promote fake Artificial Intelligence services, such as MidJourney, OpenAI's SORA and ChatGPT-5, and DALL-E, to infect unsuspecting users with password-stealing malware. [...]
title: Fake Facebook MidJourney AI page promoted malware to 1.2 million people

description: Acuity, a federal contractor that works with U.S. government agencies, has confirmed that hackers breached its GitHub repositories and stole documents containing old and non-sensitive data. [...]
title: Acuity confirms hackers stole non-sensitive govt data from GitHub repos

description: Panera Bread's recent week-long outage was caused by a ransomware attack, according to people familiar with the matter and emails seen by BleepingComputer. [...]
title: Panera Bread week-long IT outage caused by ransomware attack
